{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ambit Microsystems |model=60237EUW |revision=(T60C237) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/18/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem,wireless router |fcc_id=MCLT60H625 |ic_id=2878C-T60H625 |us_id= |pwr_v=10 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3350;QAMLink, BCM3350KPB, TN0050 P20, 53964; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W981216BH-75 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Ambit Microsystems T60H625 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3871 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3684 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 1.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=WLCM |default_ssid_regex=^WLCM$ |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=root |oui=00:02:8A |oui_eth=00:02:8A |default_ch= }} [http://www.timewarnercable.com/MediaLibrary/1/1/FAQ/Cable%20Modems/Ambit/Ambit_Orion3000_UserGuide.pdf Manual]
The device is either DOCSIS 1.0 or DOCSIS 1.1 compliant.
There is no FCC ID printed on the unit label. The FCC ID of the wireless module has been assigned to the device.
The default SSID for the device is '''WLCM'''.
